name: Beauty Within Its Flaws
description:
(WARNING- The game does contain the possibility of bright colours flashing on the screen.)

This game was made to commemorate  moshboys accomplishment of completing their 1000 game makers twitter thread:

https://twitter.com/moshboy/st...

(which I was a part of):

https://twitter.com/moshboy/st...

Beauty within its flaws is a game about being ugly, weird and bizarre with its visuals, controls, abilities and its possibilities.  And sometimes it decides it doesn't want to be any of those things and to just be itself and do what it wants to do.
